laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Chemotherapy (Ifosfamide with Mesna and Interferon Alpha therapy)

laboratory_examinations.findings: Completed an eight-session course of fractionated stereotactic radiosurgery of 4000 cGy.

Demonstrated a multilobular T-2 hyperintense heterogeneously enhancing mass filling the left hemithorax, encasing the left subclavian artery and brachial plexus, and involving the left supraclavicular fossa.
